page.name: Mason Origami Club
page.description: MHS Origami Club aims to create paper projects like origami to provide a safe space to share the craft of paper crafts from multiple cultures and help students destress. In the future, we plan to help out with decorations in partnership with other school clubs. We also would love to larger projects with local organizations to lift the spirits of our community! MHS Origami Club aims to be a peaceful and collaborative place to make new friends while helping out with a cause. We hope you can join us!
